data.Name: Regardless Of Me
data.Bio: In June 2007 guitarist and composer Emiliano Sicilia (author of the solo album "Devotion, Materialize" released in October 2006) started “Regardless Of Me” project. The band presents an experimental kind of Metal - Trip Hop - Progressive music which reminds one of the typical feeling of the Massive Attack, Portishead, Dream Theater, Katatonia and Muse. All music and lyrics have been composed, arranged and forged by Emiliano Sicilia who is also the main guitarist of the whole project and has taken care of the programming as well. Read more on Last.fm
